name: create-claude
description: Enhanced Claude Code configuration with agents, hooks, commands, output styles, automation tools and a project-tailored CLAUDE.md.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:integration
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.releaseCheck: echo 'Running release validation (dry-run)...' && npm run clean && npm install && npm run validate && npm run build && npm test && echo 'All release checks passed! Ready for version bump.'
scripts.prepack: npm run validate && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run test
scripts.version: echo 'Starting version preparation...' && npm run clean && npm install && npm run validate && npm run build && npm test && echo '⚠️  REMINDER: Update CHANGELOG.md with changes for this version!' && git add -A && echo 'Version preparation complete - files staged for commit'
